name: wrdeq

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cword(c0), cword(c1)))
-| wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0)), wa(wss(cword(c0), cword(c1)), wss(cword(c1), cword(c0))))

-| wb(wceq(cword(c0), cword(c1)), wa(wss(cword(c0), cword(c1)), wss(cword(c1), cword(c0))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 → Word(c0)= Word(c1))
⊣ ((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ c0)→(Word(c0)⊆ Word(c1)∧ Word(c1)⊆ Word(c0)))
⊣ (c0 = c1 ↔(c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ c0))
⊣ (Word(c0)= Word(c1)↔(Word(c0)⊆ Word(c1)∧ Word(c1)⊆ Word(c0)))
